parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To examine, as by torture; I torment; I buffet, as of waves. From basanos; to torture.
A (lunar) month. A primary word; a month.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To strike, smite, sting. A primary verb; to hit; specially, to sting.
A scorpion. Probably from an obsolete skerpo; a 'scorpion'.
